name: Space Crusade: The Voyage Beyond (Data Disk)
description:
Ten additional levels for the licensed strategy game Space Crusade are provided in this add-on pack, which requires the original game disk for verification (a double pack with both the original disk and the new levels was released simultaneously). As in the first game, you command a team of space marines into dangerous battles with alien foes.

The difficulty level is pitched higher than the previous level set. There are new weapons and orders, some of which require a commander who has received several promotions by playing through the levels in the original game. There are new monsters, and teleport pads are added. Background music is added, and a few visual effects have been enhanced.
developedBy: Gremlin Graphics Software Limited, Rapier Design
